name: When
description:
This game was made in 5 days for the Dani Gamejam 2, it was made in java using my own game engine.

Controls:

   WASD - Move

   LMB - Shoot

How To Play (Also In The Tutorial Menu Ingame):

Time Has Broken, Survive As Long As Possible

Be Careful Of Enemies, Shooters Will Shoot At You, While Chargers Will Charge Up, And Run At You

At Random Points, Time Will Save, When The Screen Flashes A Save Loads

Be Careful... Saves Save Everything, So If You Leave Too Many Enemies Alive, They Will Quickly Multiply
